nodes.text: The Skykeeper was the title of the religious leader on Pijal. During coronation ceremonies, the Skykeeper was to present a ceremonial sword to the new monarch. One Skykeeper acted during the coronation of Princess Fanry, in which the newly coronated queen stabbed the Skykeeper with the sword as part of her revolution against the Czerka Corporaion. The Skykeeper survived, but was badly wounded.
